title: Cloud Interview Mastery: AWS, Azure & GCP
description: Complete multi-cloud certification and interview guide covering AWS Solutions Architect, Azure DevOps Engineer, and GCP Cloud Architect. Master EC2, S3, VPC, Lambda, Azure DevOps, AKS, GCP Compute, Cloud Functions, multi-cloud architecture patterns, security best practices, cost optimization, and 500+ interview questions across all three major cloud platforms.

title: Container Orchestration Journey: Docker to Kubernetes
description: Complete containerization guide from Docker fundamentals to advanced Kubernetes orchestration. Covers Docker images, Dockerfile best practices, container networking, volumes, docker-compose, Kubernetes pods, services, deployments, ingress, RBAC, Helm charts, service mesh, monitoring with Prometheus & Grafana, autoscaling, StatefulSets, and production-ready cluster management for microservices architecture.

title: Infrastructure Automation Mastery: Terraform & Ansible
description: Master Infrastructure as Code with Terraform and configuration management with Ansible. Comprehensive coverage of Terraform providers, modules, state management, remote backends, drift detection, policy-as-code, Ansible playbooks, roles, inventory management, server provisioning, configuration automation, multi-cloud deployments across AWS, Azure, GCP, and complete infrastructure automation best practices.

title: Modern CI/CD & GitOps: Jenkins, GitHub Actions, ArgoCD
description: Build production-grade CI/CD pipelines and implement GitOps workflows. Master Jenkins pipelines, GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Azure DevOps, ArgoCD, Flux, automated testing, code quality gates, container image building, deployment strategies including Blue-Green, Canary, Rolling updates, GitOps principles, declarative deployments, rollback strategies, and release management best practices for modern DevOps teams.

title: Senior DevOps Engineer Handbook: Monitoring, Security & SRE
description: Advanced DevOps practices for senior engineers covering observability, security, and site reliability engineering. Master Prometheus metrics, Grafana dashboards, ELK stack logging, distributed tracing, APM, DevSecOps practices, secrets management, compliance scanning, SBOM, container security, SRE principles, incident response, chaos engineering, on-call best practices, DORA metrics, microservices architecture, performance optimization, and production reliability strategies.
